activities: We collect email addresses upon registration. Optionally, we collect name, gender, and age during registration. Email addresses are used only for our email newsletter, which offers an unsubscribe. We use Mail Chimp to maintain our newsletter list. Registered members can email us at info@unstuck.com to request removal from our database. Otherwise, there is no expiration to this data storage.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
